description.narrative: Improve competitiveness in pay, performance management and accountability of, and increase staffing of middle and senior staff in, the civil service in Sierra Leone.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Implementation and withdrawal conditions; Covenant 1 | Description :The Recipient shall furnish to theAssociation the respective interim unaudited financial report (IUFR) for the semester immediately preceding the date in which thewithdrawal application has been filed. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Implementation and withdrawal conditions; Covenant 2 | Description :The Recipient shall furnish to theAssociation evidence, satisfactory to the Association, of the achievement of DLIs specified in the Financing Agreement | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Implementation and withdrawal conditions; Covenant 3 | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that, not laterthan thirty (30) days after the Effective Date and throughout the period of Project implementation: (1) the authority to make anychanges to the personnel records and payroll of Civil Servants is vested in and restrictedto the HRMO; and (2) an appropriatesystem, acceptable to the Association, to audit such records and payroll, including any such changes | Frequency :Monthly
